attributes.action: Help stop the closure of Pilgrim Hospital’s Children’s Ward and Neonatal Wards
attributes.additional_details: Our children’s lives are at risk here. And it seems that ULHT have been planning this underhand for the past 2 years. ULHT removed beds from the children’s ward and were told to put them back by the CQC but ULHT did not! For more information look at SOS - Pilgrim Hospital on Facebook
attributes.background: ULHT want to temporarily close the children’s ward and neonatal wards at Pilgrim due to staff shortages. We all know that if these services close they will not return and then marks the death of Pilgrim Hospital. This means Lincoln, Nottingham and Peterborough for children’s services.
